user_query: I am planning a trip to Europe and want to convert 1000 USD to Euros. Can you provide me with the current exchange rate and historical exchange rates for the past week? Additionally, I would like to know the available quotes in the Currency Exchange API.

TaskList.description: Retrieve the current exchange rate from USD to Euro.
Retrieve the historical exchange rates from USD to Euro for the past week.
Fetch the available currency quotes from the Currency Exchange API.
